reviewText: I've seen the series before (though not in full), and it used to give me nightmares as a child. To this day I can't eat Udon noodles as a result. If you watch this particular disc you should understand why. I recommend not watching it in the dark unless you like to get really ridiculously freaked out.

if you have never seen better man that you should definetely see it. It is one of the most unusal series you may ever see but at the same time it is one of the best it may seem at first that the plot does not flow well but at the end it really comes togther so pick this up (if you dare)j\k
